Body:
triangle_text_coords = np.array([[1, 0], [2, 0], [1, 2]])
expected = np.array([[1, 0], [1, 1], [1, 2], [2, 0], [2, 1], [2, 2]])
try:
    np.testing.assert_equal(self.renderer.
        get_bounding_box_coords_for_triangle(triangle_text_coords), expected)
    res = True
except AssertionError as err:
    res = False
    print(err)
self.assertTrue(res)
triangle_text_coords2 = np.array([[0, 0], [2, 0], [0, 2]])
expected_2 = np.array([[0, 0], [0, 1], [0, 2], [1, 0], [1, 1], [1, 2], [2, 
    0], [2, 1], [2, 2]])
try:
    np.testing.assert_equal(self.renderer.
        get_bounding_box_coords_for_triangle(triangle_text_coords2), expected_2
        )
    res = True
except AssertionError as err:
    res = False
    print(err)
self.assertTrue(res)
